summary: Adds a Portal spell that directly takes you to the Ragged Flagon in Riften
descriptionHtml:
This spell adds a book and a spell that allows you to learn and have a spell to teleport to the Ragged Flagon.

(I originally called  it \"Thief\'s Bolthole\" .. but decided this was a bit easier to find) :)

The book for it is found IN the Ragged Flagon, on a Barrel, beside the hall in the back. Will upload screenshot later for exact Location, so just be patient. :) This means you HAVE to get to the Flagon in order to get it, so I don\'t see this as a real problem. 

It shouldn\'t cost you a thing, and it is credited to Player, so it shouldn\'t be a theft. I have assigned it to \"Respawn\" so that shouldn\'t be a problem either. 

Version 1.1 : Added visual and Audio effects to the spell ... that\'s it.
author: Pan Dragondagger --- aka -  Rex1029
